also available at free-crochet 1 **note ** you need to register to access the free patterns at the freepatterns com or free-crochet com websites
**yarn requirements ** worsted weight yarn 20 23 oz **finished chest sizes ** * small 34 inches 86 4 cm * large 40 inches 102 cm **additional gauge ** 1 motif = 4 inches 10 2 cm square 1 http //www free-crochet com/search html criteria=fc00645 2 http //www yarnsplus com/products/tips/crochet_cardigan htm
